Candy Crush Saga.releaseNotes:

New to the game? Don’t be shy, join the fun!

Whiteout Survival.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Tundra Album. Forge your legend in the icy realm! Gather Scene Fragments scattered across the tundra. And piece them together into spectacular scenes. Relive the timeless legends of the frost-bound era and make history yourself!
2. New Feature: Leading Glory system. Each time your state qualifies as a Leading State during State Transfer, it will receive a Leading Emblem. The Leading Emblems can be used to unlock exclusive rewards such as Sunfire Castle Shield Skin, State Transfer Event State Name Card, Sunfire Castle Skin and Turret Skin, and Exclusive State Title. Stay proud of your state!
3. New Event: Dead Shot When participating in regular events, you have a chance of earning "Shotchits". You can use the "Shotchits" to play a shooting game. Hit the bullseye for bountiful rewards! Every 2 "Chest Keys" collected can be used to open a chest that contains extra bonuses. By spending enough Shotchits, you can unlock the exclusive Action Emote: Hit!

[Optimization & Adjustment]
1. Bear Hunt: Added the Auto-Register feature, which automatically starts a Bear Hunt based on the last opening time once the cooldown ends.
2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Kingshot.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Mystic Trial. A brand-new adventure awaits! 
2. New Feature: Leading Glory. During Kingdom Transfer, your Kingdom will receive a Leading Emblem each time it qualifies as a Leading Kingdom. Accumulate Leading Emblems to unlock special Leading Glory skins. Show off your Kingdom's dominance!
3. New Feature: Mood Status. Set a status to let others know how you're feeling, making social interactions more fun and personal.

Gossip Harbor®: Merge & Story.releaseNotes:
NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY!
- NEW EPISODE: With new chapter updates every Friday; follow Quinn as she exposes secrets and solves puzzles.
- NEW EVENT:Visit Hollybell Hollow to experience the snowglobe festival and unlock the Fraser Fir Lodge! Join Sam, Mark, and Quinn as they explore a quaint arctic village. Explore by collecting points and unlock exclusive decorations to complete the event.

Clash Royale.releaseNotes:
New Update: THE RISE OF HEROES!
• NEW HEROES: Knight, Giant, Musketeer, and Mini P.E.K.K.A gain powerful new abilities!
• NEW BOXES: Collect Hero Fragments and Evolution Shards in the new Hero and Evolution Boxes
• NEW CURRENCY: Introducing Crystals - earn and spend these beauties on exclusive cosmetics!
• TROPHY ROAD & RANKED REWORK: More Arenas, smoother progression, and easier access to Ranked
• PROGRESSION CHANGES: Now a simpler system with the removal of Elite Wild Cards, Books, and Magic Coins - and the addition of Level 16
• MERGE TACTICS: New Rulers, troops, and modifiers enter the Arena, while others take a career break
• Plus bug fixes and improvements

Township.releaseNotes:
"Get ready for a new update!
What's new in Township!

New Card Collection
* Sights, traditions, and curiosities from all over the world await you in the new Journey Collection! Collect all the cards to get a unique badge and other prizes!

Season Adventures
* We're celebrating Christmas, and then we're off to France! With the Christmas and French Passes, you can win resources to develop and decorate your town!

Thrilling New Adventures
* The Adventurers' Society is in danger! Can Richard, Rachel, and Zoe stop the villain?
* A walk in the mountains turns into a rescue mission for Richard and Rachel in the middle of a raging blizzard!

* Easy Navigation
Filling orders just got easier! Tap the magnifying glass to go to the factory you need, and you'll automatically return to your orders when you close the window.

Also
* A new match-3 element—Piñata!
* A challenge on the northern seas in the new regatta season!
* A new community building—Ice Arena!"

Pokémon GO.releaseNotes: Trainers, we hope you’re enjoying your adventure in Pokémon GO! We update the app regularly with new events and features, so make sure to check the in-game News to stay up to date.

Call of Duty®: Mobile.releaseNotes:
Descend into uncharted depths with Call of Duty®: Mobile’s Season 7: Phantom Current! Unearth the secrets of the abyss and encounter CODM’s sixth Mythic Operator, Dark Shepherd, a special crossover with Girls’ Frontline, and a refreshed Legendary reward in the Secret Cache system. 

New Mythic Dark Shepherd: 
Unleash darkness with the most sinister Mythic Operator yet, Dark Shepherd – Phantom. Wield the Epic Scythe and Legendary AS-VAL to dominate the lobby with forces from another dimension. With power coursing through your veins, every fight becomes a surge of unstoppable force. 

New Secret Cache Reward: 
Another Legendary weapon skin is landing in the Secret Cache system! Log in and play to start earning the RUS-79U – Mystical Lamp… before it vanishes in a puff of smoke—and no genie can bring it back. 
 
Girls’ Frontline: 
Girls’ Frontline deploys into Call of Duty®: Mobile in Season 7! Recruit an iconic T-Doll Operator and gear up with exclusive themed items. Complete the seasonal event to de-stress, reload, and reinforce your squad with free Girls’ Frontline rewards. 

New Battle Passes:  
Season 7 brings an all-new Battle Pass and the opportunity to earn 50 tiers of free and premium rewards, including the new MG 82 weapon and Bomb Drone Scorestreak! Gear up and stay the course—more treasures await you in the Season 8 Battle Pass! 

New Battle Pass Vaults:    
Fan-favorite Battle Passes are setting sail once again in the Vault for Seasons 7 and 8—don’t miss your chance to rearm with gear from past deployments! Season 7 brings Season 11: Ultimate Frontier (2022) and Season 7: Heat Wave (2023) back on deck. Hold steady—more cargo is charted for arrival in Season 8! 

Major Gameplay Updates: 
Season 7 shifts into high gear with all-new gameplay updates for a fresh dose of chaos! Get ready to burn rubber in Mini Mayhem, where you’ll zip around the map battling for first place in an RCXD. And for the first time ever, CODM Battle Royale gets its own Gulag—fight your way back from elimination in a gritty 1v1 showdown on ‘Isolated’. 

From deep-sea secrets to Mythic mayhem, Call of Duty®: Mobile Season 7: Phantom Current plunges you into a fresh experience. The current’s pulling you in—so gear up and dive headfirst into the action!

Dark War:Survival.releaseNotes:
[Optimizations & Adjustments]

[Capital Clash] & [State of Supremacy]
- Rally and reinforcement limits for the [Capital] and [Turrets] have been removed. Survivors can now launch multiple rallies and send multiple reinforcement squads to both targets separately.
- When launching a rally or sending reinforcements to the [Capital] or a [Turret], the troop capacity is additionally increased by 40,000.
- After the [State of Supremacy] event ends, if there are untreated units in the State Hospital, a reminder bubble will appear at the bottom left of the main screen. Note: The State Hospital closes at server time Tuesday 00:00. Untreated units will be permanently lost!

[Black Gold Battlefield]
- Removed the sign-up session restriction for Team A and Team B. Both teams can now sign up for the same battle session. If your alliance has already registered before this update and needs to adjust, please make changes before server time Saturday 00:00.
- Black Gold Battlefield originally had three time slots: 01:00, 10:00, and 19:00 (server time). Due to low participation and poor match balance, the 01:00 slot has been removed. Only the 10:00 and 19:00 sessions remain. This change takes effect next Monday.

[Main Screen]
- Streamlined the World main interface to expand combat operation space: Removed the left sidebar. Troop information is now permanently displayed in the lower right corner.
- Two new settings added under [Avatar → Settings → General Settings]: [Drag Troop Avatars on the Main Screen to Control Troops] and [Return Button Visibility Next to Troop]. Used to enable/disable troop control via dragging avatars and toggling the visibility of the return button next to squads.
- Scout troops now display both march and return time.
- Increased spacing between the 4 march queues on the right side to reduce accidental taps.
- Added a [Rally] button to the left of the right-side march queues for quick access to the rally interface.
- The rally prompt bubble no longer pops up at the bottom left of the main screen when eligible for auto-join rallies.
- Removed the [Capital] prompt bubble at the bottom left of the President/Vice President view.
- Removed the quick-jump bubble on Saturdays during the Alliance Duel [Enemy Buster].
- This is currently active in States 1-120, with others to follow.

[Others]
- After obtaining a new skin item, tapping [Unlock] will now directly navigate to the skin interface.

Marvel Contest of Champions.releaseNotes:
NEW CHAMPIONS


Lizard:
Dr. Curtis Connors is a renowned scientist and field surgeon who tragically lost an arm during his service. After returning to civilian life, he devoted himself to finding a way to regenerate lost limbs by developing a serum based on reptilian DNA. He used himself as the first test subject, and while the serum worked, it also mutated his DNA and he turned himself into a human-reptile hybrid known as the Lizard. 


Spider-Man (Pavitr Prabhakar): 
Pavitr Prabhakar was born and raised in the vibrant but gridlocked city of Mumbattan. Granted magical spider powers by a shaman and guided by the moral lessons of his Aunt Maya and late uncle Bhim, he has assumed the heroic mantle of Spider-Man. These model heroics led to his induction into the Spider-Society. When the Spot invades his city and causes a disaster, Pavitr gets a painful look at the darker sides of his new life, and now searches for a better way forward for the multiverse.


CHAMPION UPDATES


Thor (Jane Foster): 
Jane returns with a brand new look! Stacking Shocks on herself to strengthen her abilities throughout a fight.
Jane’s high amount of Buff and Power Control allows her to control the Tempo of many fights against Cosmic Champions.


NEW FEATURES


Battlegrounds Unranked Queue
Starting with Season 34, Battlegrounds will now have a permanent unranked queue type. This queue will be open to Proven and higher Summoners and will cost energy to enter. Matchups will be based on an individual Summoner’s roster strength. 
Ranked matches will now exclusively cost Elders Marks to enter, which can be exchanged for energy in the newly-tuned Battlegrounds Store. Ranked matches will also now be accessible to Thronebreaker and higher Summoners.


The Cosmic Egg Relic 
Some cosmic force is drawing Unusual Eggs into The Battlerealm. And none are more unusual than the Cosmic Egg Relic. Its origins and abilities are currently a mystery. Become the envy of the coop and embark on an egg hunt like no other!


NEW QUESTS AND EVENTS


Event Quest - So Much More
Pavitr Prabhakar is investigating strange multiversal tech and trespassers and looks to The Summoner to lend a hand. Meanwhile The Lizard has stumbled into The Battlerealm after years of trying to avoid this multiversal fate. It would seem that a Sinister Six (and then some) of villains is behind both arrivals but how will these Spider-friends and foes fend when the web is revealed.


Side Quest - Top Of The Charts
Lumatrix is fascinated by the mortals, gods, mutants, and monsters which have infected The Battlerealm. Before The Founders arrive and wipe away existence, they are eager to see what kind of a spectacle they can put on! It seems that the pure thunder and blazes of battle are like music to Lumatrix’s ears. So they are demanding an epic “concert” to play out as Summoners challenge their teams to greater and greater heights!


Side Quest - Deadpool’s Mini-Tour Maze
Deadpool wants to invite each and every Summoner to take part in his new and fantastical Mini-Tour Maze filled with wonders and treasures beyond your belief. Each time you enter the Mini-Tour Maze will be a new exciting experience as you explore its winding paths. Tread lightly however as not even Deadpool knows what dangers may be lurking around each and every corner. You may even encounter the marvelous Deadpool himself wandering the labyrinth (definitely not because he’s lost).


Alliance War Showcase: Fantastic Force
The Alliance War Showcase returns, featuring some familiar defenders and Alliance War tactics from the Fantastic Force Saga. The Class Quests also introduce a new fight component--Effect Areas--as the central mechanic for the ramping node!


Incursions Saga Sector
Another Saga staple is returning, with the Founders’ War Saga Sector! Take your #Saga tagged Champions and fight through the zones to earn lucrative rewards.


All this and more! Check out the complete list of exciting updates on playcontestofchampions.com

2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Gossip Harbor®: Merge & Story.releaseNotes:
NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY!
- NEW EPISODE: With new chapter updates every Friday; follow Quinn as she exposes secrets and solves puzzles.
- NEW EVENT:Visit Hollybell Hollow to experience the snowglobe festival and unlock the Fraser Fir Lodge! Join Sam, Mark, and Quinn as they explore a quaint arctic village. Explore by collecting points and unlock exclusive decorations to complete the event.

Magic Tiles 3: Piano Game.releaseNotes: We regularly update the game to enhance your experience! Don’t forget to update and enjoy the latest improvements. Stay connected with us on TikTok, YouTube, Facebook, and Instagram @magictiles3.

Heads Up!.releaseNotes:
How do you throw an amazing winter party? Invite all the cool kids!

Updates

• This version includes content and cosmetic updates for our Winter event.
• 'Tis the season. Grab some hot cocoa and enjoy a round of laughter with "Act It Out", "Holiday Songs", "Holiday Movies", and more!
• Get a limited edition snowflake-themed card background with our holiday decks.

Please update your game for the latest content. Happy Playing!

Call of Duty®: Mobile.releaseNotes:
Descend into uncharted depths with Call of Duty®: Mobile’s Season 7: Phantom Current! Unearth the secrets of the abyss and encounter CODM’s sixth Mythic Operator, Dark Shepherd, a special crossover with Girls’ Frontline, and a refreshed Legendary reward in the Secret Cache system. 

New Mythic Dark Shepherd: 
Unleash darkness with the most sinister Mythic Operator yet, Dark Shepherd – Phantom. Wield the Epic Scythe and Legendary AS-VAL to dominate the lobby with forces from another dimension. With power coursing through your veins, every fight becomes a surge of unstoppable force. 

New Secret Cache Reward: 
Another Legendary weapon skin is landing in the Secret Cache system! Log in and play to start earning the RUS-79U – Mystical Lamp… before it vanishes in a puff of smoke—and no genie can bring it back. 
 
Girls’ Frontline: 
Girls’ Frontline deploys into Call of Duty®: Mobile in Season 7! Recruit an iconic T-Doll Operator and gear up with exclusive themed items. Complete the seasonal event to de-stress, reload, and reinforce your squad with free Girls’ Frontline rewards. 

New Battle Passes:  
Season 7 brings an all-new Battle Pass and the opportunity to earn 50 tiers of free and premium rewards, including the new MG 82 weapon and Bomb Drone Scorestreak! Gear up and stay the course—more treasures await you in the Season 8 Battle Pass! 

New Battle Pass Vaults:    
Fan-favorite Battle Passes are setting sail once again in the Vault for Seasons 7 and 8—don’t miss your chance to rearm with gear from past deployments! Season 7 brings Season 11: Ultimate Frontier (2022) and Season 7: Heat Wave (2023) back on deck. Hold steady—more cargo is charted for arrival in Season 8! 

Major Gameplay Updates: 
Season 7 shifts into high gear with all-new gameplay updates for a fresh dose of chaos! Get ready to burn rubber in Mini Mayhem, where you’ll zip around the map battling for first place in an RCXD. And for the first time ever, CODM Battle Royale gets its own Gulag—fight your way back from elimination in a gritty 1v1 showdown on ‘Isolated’. 

From deep-sea secrets to Mythic mayhem, Call of Duty®: Mobile Season 7: Phantom Current plunges you into a fresh experience. The current’s pulling you in—so gear up and dive headfirst into the action!

寒霜啟示錄.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Tundra Album. Forge your legend in the icy realm! Gather Scene Fragments scattered across the tundra. And piece them together into spectacular scenes. Relive the timeless legends of the frost-bound era and make history yourself!
2. New Feature: Leading Glory system. Each time your state qualifies as a Leading State during State Transfer, it will receive a Leading Emblem. The Leading Emblems can be used to unlock exclusive rewards such as Sunfire Castle Shield Skin, State Transfer Event State Name Card, Sunfire Castle Skin and Turret Skin, and Exclusive State Title. Stay proud of your state!
3. New Event: Dead Shot When participating in regular events, you have a chance of earning "Shotchits". You can use the "Shotchits" to play a shooting game. Hit the bullseye for bountiful rewards! Every 2 "Chest Keys" collected can be used to open a chest that contains extra bonuses. By spending enough Shotchits, you can unlock the exclusive Action Emote: Hit!

[Optimization & Adjustment]
1. Bear Hunt: Added the Auto-Register feature, which automatically starts a Bear Hunt based on the last opening time once the cooldown ends.
2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Dark War:Survival.releaseNotes:
[Optimizations & Adjustments]

[Capital Clash] & [State of Supremacy]
- Rally and reinforcement limits for the [Capital] and [Turrets] have been removed. Survivors can now launch multiple rallies and send multiple reinforcement squads to both targets separately.
- When launching a rally or sending reinforcements to the [Capital] or a [Turret], the troop capacity is additionally increased by 40,000.
- After the [State of Supremacy] event ends, if there are untreated units in the State Hospital, a reminder bubble will appear at the bottom left of the main screen. Note: The State Hospital closes at server time Tuesday 00:00. Untreated units will be permanently lost!

[Black Gold Battlefield]
- Removed the sign-up session restriction for Team A and Team B. Both teams can now sign up for the same battle session. If your alliance has already registered before this update and needs to adjust, please make changes before server time Saturday 00:00.
- Black Gold Battlefield originally had three time slots: 01:00, 10:00, and 19:00 (server time). Due to low participation and poor match balance, the 01:00 slot has been removed. Only the 10:00 and 19:00 sessions remain. This change takes effect next Monday.

[Main Screen]
- Streamlined the World main interface to expand combat operation space: Removed the left sidebar. Troop information is now permanently displayed in the lower right corner.
- Two new settings added under [Avatar → Settings → General Settings]: [Drag Troop Avatars on the Main Screen to Control Troops] and [Return Button Visibility Next to Troop]. Used to enable/disable troop control via dragging avatars and toggling the visibility of the return button next to squads.
- Scout troops now display both march and return time.
- Increased spacing between the 4 march queues on the right side to reduce accidental taps.
- Added a [Rally] button to the left of the right-side march queues for quick access to the rally interface.
- The rally prompt bubble no longer pops up at the bottom left of the main screen when eligible for auto-join rallies.
- Removed the [Capital] prompt bubble at the bottom left of the President/Vice President view.
- Removed the quick-jump bubble on Saturdays during the Alliance Duel [Enemy Buster].
- This is currently active in States 1-120, with others to follow.

[Others]
- After obtaining a new skin item, tapping [Unlock] will now directly navigate to the skin interface.

貓咪大戰爭.releaseNotes:
[14.7.1]
■修正部分程式錯誤

[14.7.0]
■追加「不死生物來襲」活動的宇宙篇第3章
　※於通過宇宙篇第3章後解放

■調整部分活動的開始條件
　「寶物嘉年華」和「統率力1/2」的活動開始條件，調整為玩家通過「世界篇」第1章的「台灣」後開始舉辦。
　當玩家將遊戲中最棒的寶物都收集完畢後，「寶物嘉年華」活動就會停止出現。
　※活動日程中的「寶物嘉年華」項目也會停止顯示。

■追加貓咪基地所顯示的活動資訊
　畫面會顯示其他頁面的貓咪基地所舉辦中的活動資訊。

■追加角色的進化型態
　追加了部份角色的第4進化

■追加角色本能
　追加了部份角色的本能、超本能

■傳奇故事
　追加新地圖

■其他追加內容
　追加等級排行報酬
　追加貓咪聯組
　改善部分遊戲功能

■修正部分程式錯誤

2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.
